Class GIO

java.lang.Object
  GIO

public class GIO
extends java.lang.Object

This module provides methods for obtaining user input and displaying messages, using graphical dialog boxes rather than printed text.

Method Summary
static void displayMessage(java.lang.String message)
          Displays the given message and waits for the user to press OK.
static boolean readBoolean(java.lang.String prompt)
          Displays the given prompt and allows the user to choose Yes or No.
static int readInt(java.lang.String prompt)
          Displays the given prompt and allows the user to enter an integer.
static java.lang.String readString(java.lang.String prompt)
          Displays the given prompt and allows the user to enter a string.
